name: Slave Balls Brainwashing
mes:
It was done; your experiments were a success. You have created a new type of Pokeball to make a special monster. A slave monster. When you throw it, it captures both a Pokemon and its trainer in a flash of purple light. Then within the ball, they are fused into a new creature that only obeys you and only lives for you. 

Your first test was a success, you fused your fellow researcher with her Rotom, and she now helps you pick new targets and records their information like a pokedex... a "slave dex," if you will.  With her at your side, it was time to collect more Slave monsters. As they say, "Gotta Catch Them All."

name: Slave Balls Brainwashing
mes:
Gira stepped outside, relishing the success of his bizarre creation. He surveyed the expansive world at his feet, brimming with countless possibilities and endless pleasures to seize. With a gleeful smirk, he spotted his next potential targets: a buxom young lady with long auburn hair walking past with her Pokémon, a tall, strong-looking Machamp. She wore a tight tank top and shorts that accentuated her ample breasts and round ass, both bouncing with each step.

Gira motioned to his Rotom-fused researcher companion, who immediately started recording the intended target. Once Gira caught her eye, she nodded her approval. It was time to act; the thrill of capturing and transforming another girl filled him with anticipation.

As he approached the young woman, he tossed a Slaveball in a practiced motion. The ball hurtled towards her and the Machamp beside her, enveloping them both in a blinding flash of purple light. The woman’s initial scream quickly became muffled as they were pulled into the ball together, their forms merging into one.

Moments later, the ball clicked shut, signifying the transformation's completion. Gira picked up the ball with confidence, a grin spreading across his face in anticipation of what awaited inside. He released its contents, revealing the new Slave Monster he had created.

Standing before him was what used to be a normal girl but now transformed into a creature of lustful devotion to him. Her eyes took on a hypnotic glow as she beheld her master for the first time.
